properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
